attributes.action: end Europe's unfair trade barriers against developing countries, and scrap the CAP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "end Europe's unfair trade barriers against developing countries, and scrap the CAP."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14129.asp

Prime Minister's Office
